summary: Provides a set of layout providers used by the Ansible test framework to recognize, validate, and manipulate the directory structures of Ansible source projects, collections, and generic unsupported layouts, exposing utilities for creating layout descriptors and locating content roots.
business_intent: Enable automated testing tools to correctly identify project roots and required subâ€‘directories for Ansible codebases and collections, ensuring consistent layout handling and validation across the test suite.
